name: yoga-layout
description: Yoga is a cross-platform layout engine enabling maximum collaboration within your team by implementing an API many designers are familiar with, and opening it up to developers across different platforms.

scripts.build: npm run copy-sources && make && npm run build:js
scripts.benchmark: npm run build && node tests/run-bench $(find tests/Benchmarks -name '*.js')
scripts.build:js: babel sources --source-maps --out-dir dist && flow-copy-source sources dist
